# Data Summarizing


## 
```{r}
data = read.csv('covid-project-raw-data/full_data_no_na.csv')
summary(data)
head(data)
plot(data)
```





```{r}
sapply(data, class)
```


```{r}
basic_model = lm(cases ~ mask_score + mask_score + ratio_pop_to_physician + unemploy_rate + HS_grad_rate + flu_vacc_. + uninsured + median_income + pop_size + X._rural + life_expectancy + sim_diversity_index, data = data)
summary(basic_model)
library(MASS)
boxcox(basic_model)
plot(basic_model)
hist(data$cases, breaks = 200)
hist(log(data$cases), breaks = 200)
```



```{r}
log_model = lm(log(cases) ~ mask_score + mask_score + ratio_pop_to_physician + unemploy_rate + HS_grad_rate + flu_vacc_. + uninsured + median_income + pop_size + X._rural + life_expectancy + sim_diversity_index, data = data)
summary(log_model)
plot(log_model)
```



```{r}
colnames(data)
for (i in colnames(data)){
  print(i)
  print(summary(eval(call('$', data, i))))
}

```

```{r}
data_norm = data
data_norm$cases_norm = data_norm$cases/data_norm$pop_size
norm_model = lm(cases_norm ~ mask_score + mask_score + ratio_pop_to_physician + unemploy_rate + HS_grad_rate + flu_vacc_. + uninsured + median_income +  X._rural + life_expectancy + sim_diversity_index, data = data)



summary(basic_model)
library(MASS)
boxcox(basic_model)
plot(basic_model)
hist(data$cases, breaks = 200)
hist(log(data$cases), breaks = 200)

```


```{r}
log_model = lm(log(cases) ~ mask_score + mask_score + ratio_pop_to_physician + unemploy_rate + HS_grad_rate + flu_vacc_. + uninsured + median_income + pop_size + X._rural + life_expectancy + sim_diversity_index, data = data)
```
